mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ICT_NOTICE ( NNUM ,NSUBJECT ,NCONTENT ,NPHOTO ,DELETEYN ,INSERTDATE ,UPDATEDATE ,NHIT ) VALUES ( #{nnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{nsubject, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{ncontent, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{nphoto, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,'Y' ,SYSDATE ,SYSDATE ,0 )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.NNUM AS NNUM ,A.NSUBJECT AS NSUBJECT ,A.NCONTENT AS NCONTENT ,A.NPHOTO AS NPHOTO ,TO_CHAR(A.INSERTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS INSERTDATE ,TO_CHAR(A.UPDATEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPDATEDATE ,A.NHIT AS NHIT ,CEIL(ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.NNUM DESC)/#{pageSize, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AS pagesize ,COUNT(A.NNUM) OVER() AS totalCount ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.NNUM DESC) AS NOTICENO FROM ICT_NOTICE A WHERE A.DELETEYN = 'Y' ORDER BY A.NNUM DESC ) WHERE pageSize = #{curPage, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT A.NNUM AS NNUM ,A.NSUBJECT AS NSUBJECT ,A.NCONTENT AS NCONTENT ,A.NPHOTO AS NPHOTO ,A.NHIT AS NHIT ,A.DELETEYN AS DELETEYN ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.INSERTDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS INSERTDATE ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.UPDATEDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPDATEDATE ,NVL((SELECT COUNT(LNUM) FROM "ORCLICT00"."ICT_LIKE" WHERE LIKETHIS = #{nnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), 0) AS LIKECNT FROM "ORCLICT00"."ICT_NOTICE" A ,"ORCLICT00"."ICT_MEMBER" B ,"ORCLICT00"."ICT_LIKE" C WHERE A.DELETEYN = 'Y' AND B.DELETEYN = 'Y' group by A.NNUM, A.NSUBJECT, A.NCONTENT, A.NPHOTO, A.NHIT, A.DELETEYN, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.INSERTDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.UPDATEDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.update: UPDATE ICT_NOTICE SET DELETEYN = 'N' ,UPDATEDATE = SYSDATE WHERE NNUM = #{nnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DELETEYN = 'Y'
